title: Jason Witten, Kyler Murray, LeBron James, and Bryce Harper
itunes:title: Jason Witten, Kyler Murray, LeBron James, and Bryce Harper
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb explains why TE Jason Witten is making a mistake going back to the Dallas Cowboys, why teams should be concerned about drafting QB Kyler Murray, why he feels Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James is not a top 10 player right now, and why OF Bryce Harper new contract with the Philadelphia Phillies was a loss for the player. Guests include Chris Broussard, Mark Schlereth, and Tom Penn.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
